title.rendered: Berger unveils Coffee Table Book celebrating change stories

content.rendered: Smile Foundation and Berger Paints have jointly launched a coffee table book titled ‘From Canvas to Community’ at Oxford Bookstore, Kolkata. The book highlights the journeys of 12 painters who transformed their lives through the Berger iTrain on Wheels project, implemented by Smile Foundation. Since its inception in 2021, the iTrain on Wheels initiative has reached and upskilled thousands of painters across 24 states. Through mobile iTrain vans, the program has helped both aspiring and experienced painters enhance their skills and entrepreneurial potential.
